Articles.Content: Quick question, it might be me being a noob and all but how do you download the mod now, the new instructions posted are a bit unclear, do i just download the required mods and pop the provided file ( CrasyESP's ) into the game date folder?

10 hours ago, Natskyge said:

Quick question, it might be me being a noob and all but how do you download the mod now, the new instructions posted are a bit unclear, do i just download the required mods and pop the provided file ( CrasyESP's ) into the game date folder?

 

CrazyESP's link has a "NASA-Pack" folder, in it is "GameData" - just drop the contents of GameData into your GameData folder and that should do it
This mod is amazing, but one thing the fuel cells dont work? Any way to fix this?
I am confused where do I download it

23 hours ago, wissx said:

I am confused where do I download it

 

Dude, 2-3 pages back, read the topic - CrazyESP's link
How is the realisme overhaul compatabilty going?
ok, some good news from on high, Tristonwilson, with Mike-NZ's blessing, has agreed to take temporary control of this mod.
Has anyone tried the Canadarms yet? Mine seem to whip around like they are made of lasso ropes. Like there is no joint system in the arm parts.

On 2/12/2016 at 7:57 PM, Sampa said:

ok, some good news from on high, Tristonwilson, with Mike-NZ's blessing, has agreed to take temporary control of this mod.

Ayy, that's great news! What can we expect to see now?

I cant seem to find the official STS blue launch towers that are pictured in the front page. They are really well done but cannot find them in my parts pack to test them out. Am I really going that crazy?

On 9. jan. 2016 at 9:27 AM, CrazyESP said:

Hello guys and happy new year. 

Back to work in a few days.

Ro patch wont work until we fix the ferram 3d and colliders bug that the beta and previous versions  have.Thats why we were looking for a 3d editor and he is currentlly working on the new collider parts for the new versión.

I expect to release the ferram compatible  soon, if all the patches work fine.Sorry for the delay in replay but hollydays are hollydays. 

How is the ferram aerospace compatabilty going?
Made another video using your mod, this time with Stock kerbin not RSS

Does anyone else have the problem of the orbiter not even showing up? I used the patch for loading menu (It just stopped, didn't do anything more. The game still responded, just when it got to the config it stoped.) But now it doesn't even show the orbiter in anything...

Hello to all.

Any config files around that add the ablator values to this mod????

Thanks for any info.

Cheers.

4 hours ago, drtedastro said:

Hello to all.

Any config files around that add the ablator values to this mod????

Thanks for any info.

Cheers. 

@PART[STS*,km_ssme_STS]:FINAL
{
	@maxTemp = 2600
	%skinMaxTemp = 9500
	MODULE
	{
		name = ModuleAblator
		ablativeResource = Ablator
		lossExp = -7500
		lossConst = 0.1
		pyrolysisLossFactor = 6000
		reentryConductivity = 0.01
		ablationTempThresh = 500
	}
	RESOURCE
	{
		name = Ablator
		amount = 7500
		maxAmount = 7500
	}

}

Probably overpowered to boot, but you can tone (ablator) it down to your liking. Your results may vary due to mod version or FAR or etc.  This code will add ablator to every part ever that would be exposed to the heating.

Thank you all for your input.  for further questions, I will allow tristonwilson to inform you of changes or fixes due to my lack of time to keep up to date on this.  I am, however, keeping in contact with him.  Also, sDaze, thank you for that video!

Many thanks.

I appreciate your help and this file.  It shows me how to fix other items i have problems with as well.

Again, thanks

 

Cheers.
Thank you, I will make sure that Tristonwilson gets a hold of this.

sorry all. ive been a bit busy. ill get to all your questions soon

New info.

The config did work, but,,,, the amount of ablator added (7500) make the shuttle so heavy (took weight up from 170t to 327t lift off weight).  I toned it down to 350 and it only added a few ton.  worked great. many thanks.

cheers.

cheers.

Welcome !  Yea haha I did that cuz i was burning up during re-entry. This I guess was due to me having the shuttle version that was not done by Mike. MikeNZ re-did the aero/thermodynamics I suppose and now 7500 ablator is definitely overkill. Glad to be of help
